body: Hi Mostapha, Great work done by developing such wonderful tools. I have a suggestion for WindRose Component. As per attached image, [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/f-5dhOEsZkvHzcNb8Yf6aIuNnXZzEuMapa6NTTyoRny9ITZMw1SBx-NyGIPCzY8u9TYxXuiLAYWjcZQ4mkLCMhLu2LysYHBs/Windrose.jpg) Outer two lines indicate Wind Speed and Frequency respectively. Being an analyst, we are aware about what they indicate, but for a reviewer it is harder to understand. Providing a legend for that would make that data easily understandable. Some solution I have come up with is as per image below: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/f-5dhOEsZkubymQE8bu4Hg*LAfLU8DMX2dIksx1LADzBdt3GCkG26Wm01UhwJl9Nr6QeqeXIkq5VyXGkQtpjsMCCbBZm4k3L/WindrosewithLegend.png) Keep up the great work. Thanks, Bijit.
